name: HALLOWEEN - PART III
description:
Finally, even this personal story of mine comes to an end, Myers has the minutes numbered. After escaping death in the latest accident that saw him run over by a car, Michael made his victim escape and be taken away in an ambulance. This time Myers will come to his senses again and get the ambulance out of the way. After the crash he will be free again. But now even the most famous of serial killers is wounded and tired, feeling lonely, he takes refuge in the sewers and remains there waiting for death.

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

Left Shift - Run

Mouse Button Left - Shoot or Fight
